title: Shirt price increases, impact on tie market

content.question: If shirts and ties are complements and if the price of shirts increases due to an increase in the price of cotton, which of the following is most likely to occur in the market for ties in the short run?

choices.label: The equilibrium price and quantity of ties will increase.
The equilibrium price and quantity of ties will decrease.
The equilibrium price of ties will increase and the equilibrium quantity will decrease
The supply of ties will increase.
The demand for ties will increase.

content.answer: The equilibrium price and quantity of ties will decrease.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
